text:
e="preserve">Maurice Roëves (; 19 March 1937 – 14 July 2020) was a Scottish actor. He was born in Sunderland, England. His best known movie roles were in "Ulysses", "Oh! What a Lovely War" and "Judge Dredd". His best known television roles were on "EastEnders" (2003), "A Touch of Frost" (2003) and "Skins" (2008).
Roëves died on 14 July 2020, aged 83.
